Class FlightChanges

java.lang.Object
FlightChanges
public class FlightChanges
extends java.lang.Object
Class that handles changes in flights

    • makeFlightChanges

      public static void makeFlightChanges​(Employee employee, Flight flightInfo, int flightID, java.lang.String userView, java.util.Scanner scnrInput, Writer writer) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method to let user make flight changes
      Parameters:
      employee - Employee who will make changes
      flightInfo - Hash Map that contains all flight information
      flightID - ID of Flight that changes are being made to
      userView - User Input
      scnrInput - Scanner
      writer - Instance of Writer Class
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Exception

    • updateArrivalDateTime

      public static void updateArrivalDateTime​(java.lang.String newDepartureDate, java.lang.String newDepartureTime, int duration, int timeZoneDifference, Flight flightInfo, Writer writer)
      Method to update arrival date and time
      Parameters:
      newDepartureDate - Departure Date entered by user
      newDepartureTime - Departure Time entered by user
      duration - Duration of flight
      timeZoneDifference - Time zone difference of cities
      flightInfo - Flight selected
      writer - Instance of Writer Class

    • cancelFlight

      public static void cancelFlight​(Employee employee, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Flight> flights, java.lang.String userCancel, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Person> people, Writer writer) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method for employees to cancel flights
      Parameters:
      employee - Employee who will cancel flights
      flights - Hash Map that contains all flight information
      userCancel - User input
      people - Hash Map that contains all customer/employee information
      writer - Instance of Writer Class
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Exception
